title: Provided further that the plantation/green space of width not less than 1
clause_text: Provided further that the plantation/green space of width not less than 1.0 m shall be developed all along the edge of carriageway below the flyover or central median with width not more than width of pillar, except the accesses wherever necessary or as may be required by the Commissioner. Any alignment modifications introduced in Metro/Mono/Coastal Road
